segments.text: Hello . I want to purchase an old music box .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We have a good variety . What decade would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I was hoping I could find something made in the ' 20s .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There are six on this table .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope at least one of them has dancing figures .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Many people like the dancing figures . Two of our boxes have the figures .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So hard to choose . I think I'll take this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That one will bring you many hours of pleasure .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does a warranty come with this music box ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , but if it breaks down , you're on your own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just thought I would ask .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When you buy a Model T , you can't expect a warranty .
segments.speaker: S2
